constituent: cool, ice, orders, meeting, chop-seal, hanko
koohiiStory1: To keep your water cool, just order some ice.
koohiiStory2: The Japanese boss gives an order at the meeting: eat ice to stay cool (since they won´t be running the air conditioning anymore).
kunYomi: つめ.たい、ひ.える、ひ.や、ひ.ややか、ひ.やす、ひ.やかす、さ.める、さ.ます
readingExamples: 冷ます (さ.ます), 冷める (さ.める), 冷たい (つめ.たい), 冷える (ひ.える), 冷や (ひ.や), 冷やかす (ひ.やかす), 冷やす (ひ.やす)
words: to banter, to make fun of, to jeer at, to cool, to refrigerate
cool, dampen, let cool, throw a damper on, spoil
become cool, wear off, abate, subside, dampen
cold (to the touch), chilly, icy, freezing, coldhearted
